lead_paragraph: Roger Federer easily advanced to the quarterfinals in the Swiss Indoors at Basel yesterday, winning the final eight games in a 6-2, 6-0 victory over Spain’s Guillermo García-López. Federer, trying to win his hometown tournament for the first time, extended his longest winning streak of the year to 21 matches.
